title: Haven't been friends long enough with a friend i've had for 3 seasons? (With probable reason for it)
body:
I went out with a friend of mine today to get some rp. He bought the card and all i really wanted was one skin. We put the Rp on his account so he could gift me the skin and he could use the rest of the RP however for some reason he cant gift me because we havent been friends long enough? 

I've had him on my friends lists for 3 seasons. 

What im thinking it might be was because my friend recently got a name change from "The dank doge" To "Wild Duck" However i dont see why this should effect gifting privileges. 

It's probably a bug riot has to fix but it really sucks, was looking forward to the skin.

replies.body:
Hey,

Thanks for letting us know - We're looking into it now.

Cheers
Mindstar
Thanks, hope it gets fixed soon :)
It should be fixed now - give it another try and let me know how you go :)
yes it worked for me yesterday ty cx Just in time for my birthday
